page.description: The STATUSBAR.SET_TEXT() method displays the specified text on the Status Bar.

argument.name: text
argument.description: The text to display in the Status Bar.

section.description: Displays the status of a task.
section.example: tbl = table.open("c:\a5\a_sports\customer") iterations = 0 tbl.fetch_first() while .not. tbl.fetch_eof() tbl.fetch_next() iterations = iterations + 1 statusbar.SET_text("Working - records processed: " + str(iterations,5,0)) 'Put in code that does something to each record here end while statusbar.clear()
